name: Dungeon Runner VR
description:
**Made for Google Cardboard**

Adventure through the dark and trap-riddled dungeon in this new and exciting VR Infinite Runner! Race through the many different traps that block your path, proving you are the best dungeon runner there is!

Controls:
Tilt your head left and right to move sideways. To jump, look up and press the cardboard button. The longer you press the button, the larger the jump range. To slide, look down and press the cardboard button.

Your top scores can be seen by looking up in the main menu.

Enjoy and good luck!
